channel.title: Data Infrastructure on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Data Infrastructure on FinanClub

item.title: CFLT
item.description: score:19 Chances: Confluent has rallied 50% in February, fueled by better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and an optimistic outlook. Rising data streaming adoption can drive solid growth for Confluent. Confluent is developing a technology that every investor should learn about. Risks: Confluent Inc reported an insider sale according to a recent SEC filing.

item.title: CRDO
item.description: score:66 Chances: Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past two months. The company is an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved energy efficiency as data rates and bandwidth requirements increase. Risks: Notable insider transactions involving the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) may raise concerns among investors.
